cards.title: Science Spectacular
cards.description: Demonstrate your understanding of scientific principles.
cards.challenge: Explain the water cycle in detail, including at least 5 different stages, and give an example of how human activities affect each stage.

cards.title: Historical Timeline
cards.description: Navigate through the corridors of time.
cards.challenge: Place these events in chronological order and give approximate dates: Fall of Roman Empire, American Civil War, World War I, Renaissance, Industrial Revolution.

cards.title: Literature Legends
cards.description: Show your knowledge of great literary works.
cards.challenge: Name the authors of these classic works: '1984', 'Pride and Prejudice', 'To Kill a Mockingbird', 'The Great Gatsby', and 'Romeo and Juliet'.

cards.title: Mathematical Mysteries
cards.challenge: Explain what pi (Ï€) represents, give its value to 5 decimal places, and describe 3 real-world applications where pi is essential.

cards.title: Geography Master
cards.description: Navigate the world with your geographical expertise.
cards.challenge: Name all 7 continents, the highest mountain on each continent, and one unique geographical feature of each.

cards.title: Art Appreciation
cards.description: Demonstrate your knowledge of art and artists.
cards.challenge: Identify the artistic movements and describe the key characteristics of: Impressionism, Surrealism, and Abstract Expressionism. Name one famous artist from each.

cards.title: Technology Timeline
cards.description: Trace the evolution of human technology.
cards.challenge: Explain how the Internet works in simple terms, including what happens when you type a website address and press enter.

cards.title: Biology Breakdown
cards.description: Explore the complexities of life itself.
cards.challenge: Explain the process of photosynthesis, including the reactants, products, and why it's essential for life on Earth.

cards.title: Political Systems
cards.description: Navigate the world of government and politics.
cards.challenge: Compare and contrast democracy, monarchy, and republic forms of government. Give a modern example of each.

cards.title: Economic Principles
cards.description: Understand how money and markets work.
cards.challenge: Explain supply and demand using a real-world example, and describe how inflation affects everyday purchases.

cards.title: Space Exploration
cards.description: Journey through the cosmos with your knowledge.
cards.challenge: Name the planets in our solar system in order from the sun, and give one interesting fact about each planet.

cards.title: Music Theory
cards.description: Demonstrate your understanding of musical concepts.
cards.challenge: Explain what an octave is, name the notes in a C major scale, and describe the difference between major and minor keys.

cards.title: World Languages
cards.challenge: Say 'Hello' and 'Thank you' in 5 different languages, and explain which language family each belongs to.

cards.title: Philosophy Fundamentals
cards.description: Explore deep questions about existence and knowledge.
cards.challenge: Explain the philosophical question 'What is the meaning of life?' and summarize how at least two different philosophical schools might answer it.

cards.title: Environmental Science
cards.challenge: Explain climate change, its primary causes, and describe 5 specific actions individuals can take to reduce their environmental impact.
